scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build-frontend-dev && npm run start-dev
scripts.build-prod: npm run clean && npm run build-frontend-prod
scripts.build-frontend-dev: npm run copy-static-assets && npm run build-base-css-dev && mkdir -p www_static_dist/js && webpack --mode development --progress
scripts.build-frontend-prod: npm run copy-static-assets && npm run build-base-css-prod && mkdir -p www_static_dist/js && webpack --mode production --progress
scripts.build-base-css-prod: mkdir -p www_static_dist/css && node-sass --output-style compressed ReactWebApp/styles/base.scss > www_static_dist/css/app.css
